doc.name: MetroIIPtidesPort
doc.description:
A specialized port for Ptides platform I/O implementing functionality for sensors, actuators and network ports.

This class is identical to PtidesPort except Ptides director is mapped to MetroIIPtidesDirector.
doc.author: Patricia Derler, Liangpeng Guo
doc.property: Actuate at event timestamp parameter that defaults to the boolean value TRUE. If this parameter is set to FALSE, an actuator can produce outputs as soon as they are available.
Device delay parameter that defaults to the double value 0.0.
Device delay bound parameter that defaults to the double value 0.0.
Flag that is true if the port is a network receiver or transmitter. The flag defaults to false.
Network delay bound parameter that defaults to the double value 0.0.
Platform delay bound parameter that defaults to the double value 0.0.
Source platform delay bound parameter that defaults to the double value 0.0.
